rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 18 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 6:23 PM, 09 July 2025(Wednesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Bataan, Pampanga, Bulacan, Nueva Ecija, Cavite and Batangas within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Metro Manila(Quezon City, Marikina, Caloocan, Valenzuela), Rizal(San Mateo, Rodriguez), Zambales(Botolan, San Marcelino, San Narciso, San Felipe, Cabangan, Castillejos, San Antonio) and Tarlac(San Jose, Capas, Bamban) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
